attributes.action: pass legislation to enable the redistribution of a proportion of the land held tight in the hands and deeds of a tiny hereditary aristocracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 70% of Britain is owned by 1% of the population. The historical injustice of the majority of land in the United Kingdom being held and exploited by a few people through a hereditary line dating back nearly 1000 years. Redistribution of only a fraction of this wealth could resolve all our current economic difficulties! Google 'Who owns Britain?' for all the facts!
